summary: Modified scripts for original Achieve That mod changing 7 achievements with level requirements.
descriptionHtml:
Modified scripts for original Achieve That mod changing 7 achievements with level requirements.

Changed achievements include:
Self-Defense - Reach level [u]5[/u] killing less than 500 NPC.
Kill On Sight - Reach level [u]75[/u] killing more than 500 NPC.
Say No To Alchemy - Reach level [u]2[/u] using less than 5 potions.
Tribute To Mad Skill - Reach level [u]5[/u] not crafting any item.
Greedy - Reach level [u]5[/u] not investing gold in any store.
Born to Kill - Slay a dragon at level [u]50[/u] or below.
Let's Waste No Time - Get level [u]2[/u] in [u]five[/u] days.

I was fed up by having to redo/not being able to do all this achievements on consecutive plays, so I modified and recompiled scripts (actually the only changed file is athandlerscript.psc)

Installation: Just unpack it in the data folder.
author: Endru1241
